w :  did you use credit cards on your vacation last month in europe ?
m :  sure i did .  they certainly beat going around with a wallet full of big bills .  but carrying lots of cash is still very common among some older people traveling abroad .

question: what does the man say about some elderly people ?
choice: they would rather travel around than stay at home .
they prefer to carry cash when traveling abroad .
they usually carry many things around with them .
answer: they prefer to carry cash when traveling abroad .
